analyzed: atha triṃśikā vijñapti kārikāḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya vasubandhoḥ
ātma dharma upacāraḥ hi vividhaḥ yaḥ pravartate

original: vijñānapariṇāme 'sau pariṇāmaḥ sa ca tridhā // Tvk_1 //
analyzed: vijñāna pariṇāme pariṇāmaḥ sa ca tridhā
vipākaḥ manana ākhyaḥ ca vijñaptiḥ viṣayasya ca
tatra ālaya ākhyam vijñānam vipākaḥ sarva bījakam
a saṃvidita kopa ādi sthāna vijñaptikam ca tat
sadā sparśa manaskāra vid sañjñā cetanā anvitam
upekṣā vedanā tatra anivṛtā avyākṛtam ca tat
tathā sparśa ādayaḥ tat ca vartate srotasā ogha vat
tasya vyāvṛtiḥ arha tve tat āśritya pravartate
tad ālambam manaḥ nāma vijñānam manana ātmakam
kleśaiḥ caturbhiḥ sahitam nivṛta avyākṛtaiḥ sadā
ātma duṣṭi ātma moha ātma māna ātma sneha sañjñitaiḥ
yatra ajaḥ tad mayaiḥ anyaiḥ sparśa ādyaiḥ ca arhataḥ na tat

original: na nirodhasamāpattau mārge lokottare na ca // Tvk_7 //
analyzed: na nirodha samāpattau mārge lokottare na ca
dvitīyaḥ pariṇāmaḥ yam tṛtīyaḥ ṣaḍvidhasya yā
viṣayasya upalabdhiḥ sā kuśala akuśala advayā
sarvatragaiḥ viniyataiḥ kuśalaiḥ caitasaiḥ asau
samprayuktā tathā kleśaiḥ ūpa kleśaiḥ tri vedanā
ādyāḥ sparśa ādayaḥ chanda adhimokṣa smṛtayaḥ saha
samādhi dhībhyām niyatāḥ śraddhā atha hriḥ apatrapā
alobha ādi trayam vīryam praśrabdhiḥ sā apramādikā
ahiṃsā kuśalāḥ kleśāḥ rāga pratigha mūḍhayaḥ
māna dṛś vicikitsāḥ ca krodha upanahane punar

original: mrakṣaḥ pradāśa īrṣyārtha mātsaryaṃ saha māyayā // Tvk_12 //
analyzed: mrakṣaḥ pradāśaḥ īrṣyā artha mātsaryam saha māyayā
śāṭhyam madaḥ vihiṃsā hrīḥ atrapā styānam uddhavaḥ

original: āśraddhamatha kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitā smṛtiḥ // Tvk_13 //
analyzed: āśraddham atha kausīdyam pramādaḥ muṣitā smṛtiḥ
vikṣepaḥ samprajanyam ca kaukṛtyam middham eva ca
vitarkaḥ ca vicāraḥ ca iti upakleśāḥ dvaye dvidhā
pañcānām mūla vijñāne yathāpratyayam udbhavaḥ

original: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale // Tvk_15 //
analyzed: vijñānānām saha na vā taraṅgāṇām yathā jale
manaḥ vijñāna sambhūtiḥ sarvadā āsañjñikāt ṛte
samāpatti dvayāt middhāt mūrchanāt api acittakāt
vijñāna pariṇāmaḥ yam vikalpaḥ yat vikalpyate

original: tena tannāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam // Tvk_17 //
analyzed: tena tat na asti tena idam sarvam vijñapti mātrakam
sarva bījam hi vijñānam pariṇāmaḥ tathā tathā

original: yātyanyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate // Tvk_18 //
analyzed: yāti anyonya vaśāt yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate
karmaṇaḥ vāsanā grāha dvaya vāsanayā saha
kṣīṇe pūrva vipāke janayanti tat

original: yena yena vikalpena yadyad vastu vikalpyate /
analyzed: yena yena vikalpena yat yat vastu vikalpyate

original: parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na sa vidyate // Tvk_20 //
analyzed: parikalpitaḥ eva asau svabhāvaḥ na sa vidyate
paratantra svabhāvaḥ tu vikalpaḥ pratyaya udbhavaḥ

original: niṣpannastasya pūrveṇa sadā rahitatā tu yā // Tvk_21 //
analyzed: niṣpannaḥ tasya pūrveṇa sadā rahita tā tu yā

original: ata eva sa naivānyo nānanyaḥ paratantrataḥ /
analyzed: atas eva sa na eva anyaḥ na ananyaḥ paratantrataḥ

original: anityatādivad vācyo nādṛṣṭe 'smin sa dṛśyate // Tvk_22 //
analyzed: anitya tā ādi vat vācyaḥ na adṛṣṭe smin sa dṛśyate
trividhasya svabhāvasya trividhām niḥsvabhāva tām
sandhāya sarva dharmāṇām deśitā niḥsvabhāva tā
prathamaḥ lakṣaṇena eva paraḥ punar
na svayambhāvaḥ etasya iti aparā niḥsvabhāva tā
dharmāṇām parama arthaḥ ca sa yatas tathatā api saḥ
sarvakālam tathā bhāvāt sā eva vijñaptimātra tā
yāvat vijñapti mātra tve vijñānam na avatiṣṭhati
grāha dvayasya anuśayaḥ tāvat na vinivartate
vijñaptimātram evā idam iti api haya upalambhataḥ
sthāpayan agratas kiñcid tad mātre na avatiṣṭhate
yad ālambanam vijñānam na eva upalabhate tadā
sthitam vijñāna mātra tve grāhya abhāve tad agrahāt
jñānam lokottaram ca tat
āśrayasya parāvṛttiḥ dvidhā dauṣṭhulya hānitaḥ
saḥ eva anasravaḥ dhātuḥ acintyaḥ kuśalaḥ dhruvaḥ
sukhaḥ dharma ākhyaḥ yam mahā muneḥ
triṃśikā vijñapti kārikāḥ samāptāḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam ācārya vasubandhoḥ
